AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Frontier Upbringing
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised on a remote colony that had been recently discovered as habitable, if somewhat difficult to integrate for human life. Thanks to this hardship and the struggle to put food on the table, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to appreciate the simple things and never shunned a day on the fields or with the barn animals.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Urban Upbringing
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised on one of the Core Worlds as a lowly Grounder to a family just wealthy enough to avoid living in the Slums. Having never eaten anything other than processed foods, [PAWN_pronoun] attended schools and learned a broad education of the history of humanity.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Slum Dweller
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in one of the many shanty towns on a highly populated Industrial World in a local community. Food was hard to come by and had to be scavenged, [PAWN_pronoun] used numerous methods to survive without drawing too much attention from law enforcement.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Digital Upbringing
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] experienced Sleeve Death not long after their Stack was integrated, and [PAWN_possessive] parents were unable to afford an appropriate Sleeve. As such, [PAWN_pronoun] was given what little virtual lessons and experience as could be afforded and has developed insecurities and a lack of identity.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Early Resleeving
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] experienced accidental Sleeve Death during [PAWN_possessive] early years and was given a new sleeve as per Victim Restitution. The Sleeve was completely different in all aspects but lasted for the rest of their childhood, the imbalance between the Sleeve and the Stack meant [PAWN_pronoun] experienced life in a chaotic manner.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Rich Aspirant
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had a single experience with someone rich during a charity event that impacted [PAWN_possessive] life in such a manner that [PAWN_possessive] was willing to do whatever it took to also become just as rich. The viability of this dream might be somewhat difficult, as [PAWN_pronoun] wants to use the power to help others rather than hoard wealth.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Power Obsessed
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] learned about the lifestyles of the rich and powerful early on and decided [PAWN_pronoun] wanted that experience as well. Having no scruples with illicit or morally ambiguous behaviour, [PAWN_pronoun] managed to work their way up the social hierarchy and managed to touch the lives of the powerful as part of their early career.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Praetorian Recruit
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was picked up at a young age by the core worlds military for displaying particular qualities that would make [PAWN_possessive] an uncompromising soldier. Most training having occurred in virtual and in special combat Sleeves, [PAWN_pronoun] proved a valuable asset for the Praetorians.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Settled World Colonist
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] once inhabited one of the remote Settled Worlds during its initial developmental stages and helped keep their colony running. Life was dull and uninteresting compared to living on a Rimworld, as [PAWN_pronoun] was always under the watchful eye of the local authorities.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Settled World Refugee
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] managed to obtain transit to a remote Settled World under a resettlement program. Fleeing from a life of danger and conflict, [PAWN_pronoun] hoped to start a new life without having to worry about raiders and criminals coming to take [PAWN_possessive] hard-earned belongings.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Settled World Civilian
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew tired of the drab and boring lifestyle of living in cities ruled over by the rich rather than the local authorities. Disillusioned with the government failures, [PAWN_pronoun] took the first affordable transit off [PAWN_possessive] world in order to gain some semblance of control over [PAWN_possessive] life.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Virtual Addict
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent an astronomical amount of money on experiencing all that Virtual could offer. Whether it was other worlds, blood arenas, sexperiences or the lives of Meths, [PAWN_pronoun] was eventually forced to go cold-turkey when [PAWN_possessive] debtors started trying to collect.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Rich Outcast
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be rich and powerful before being cast out by their relatives for being an embarrassment. No longer privileged to obscene wealth and decadence, [PAWN_pronoun] has been forced to live as a lowly Grounder outside of the core worlds.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Praetorian
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of the core world military forces and saw numerous battles on different worlds in different Sleeves. Relying on re-acclimation drugs, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to use many combat Sleeves over time but has developed numerous social deficiencies.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Former Yakuza Enforcer
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] got into an ancient organized crime family as an enforcer, exerting their will wherever required and getting paid to do it. Eventually the credits werenâ€™t enough when authorities investigated, so [PAWN_pronoun] quickly escaped and purchased passage off-world without care for the destination.

AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.title: Power Fanatic
AlteredCarbon.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] believes in the righteousness of the rich and powerful, that they are living, breathing gods among mere mortals and that with enough worship, [PAWN_pronoun] would be blessed to join their ranks. Naturally, [PAWN_pronoun] was discarded when no longer useful but that dogmatic faith remains.
